species.pain_description: Pure, intense, brilliant pain. Like fire-walking over flaming charcoal witha 3-inch rusty nail grinding into your heel.
Blinding, fierce, shockingly electric. A running hair dryer has been dropped in your bubble bath.
Bold and unrelenting. Somebody is using a drill to excavate your ingrown toenail.
Caustic and burning. Distinctly bitter aftertaste. Like spilling a beaker of hydrochloric acid on a paper cut.
Like a matchhead that flips off and burns your skin.
